sessionSummary: Integrated lightweight Playwright smoke tests and telemetry validation into CI pipeline. Updated documentation and fixed TypeScript errors found during validation.

decisions.rationale: To keep CI runtime reasonable and avoid heavy setup for basic smoke tests.
alternatives: Run full E2E on every PR (too slow)

decisions.rationale: To ensure the telemetry validation script itself is working correctly by testing against mock artifacts.
alternatives: Only run telemetry validation on actual artifacts
